name: Redcarpet Tables
tagline: Demos how to put borders on Redcarpet-generated tables
body:
### Welcome to Redcarpet Tables

Here's a Recarpet table with borders:

| Test | Test | Test | 
| -----|:----:|-----:|
| test | test | test |         
| test | test | test |
| test | test | test |
| test | test | test |
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
